description:
A nifty combination of face protection and scarf for gap-free coverage in cold and windy conditions.

  • Mask is Neofleece®: waterproof, windproof neoprene, lined with fleece for comfort against skin
  • Neck section is midweight fleece
  • Adjustable Velcro® back closure
name: Seirus Neofleece Combo Scarf - Unisex
